channel.title: +1 Forward - Kult: Divinity Lost
channel.description:
The new episode of +1 Forward has rent the veil and arrived. This episode @Teddog looks at *Kult: Divinity Lost* with designer Robin Liljenberg.
**https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/1-forward/kult-divinity-lost**
02:35 - Read a Sitch about employing improv in games 12:30 - Open Your Brain to *Kult* 30:35 - Act Under Fire with The Driver
You can purchase *Kult: Divinity Lost* from Drive Thru RPG here (aff): [https://www.drivethrurpg.com/product/259252/Kult-Divinity-Lost--4th-Edition-of-Kult-Core-Rules?affiliate_id=7849](https://www.drivethrurpg.com/product/259252/Kult-Divinity-Lost--4th-Edition-of-Kult-Core-Rules?affiliate_id=78493)

item.title: +1 Forward - Kult: Divinity Lost
item.dc:creator: @Anders
item.description:
@Anders wrote:

Interesting! I’ve run some Kult on RPGnet and I’ll be interested in hearing what you have to say about it.

Read full topic
